resources.string: Switch quickly to another paired device without disconnecting your earbuds or turning on pairing mode again. This works with any nearby device that was previously paired with your earbuds.
Automatically adjust the volume based on your surroundings and activities.

Control your earbuds effortlessly with intuitive touch gestures. Use single tap, double tap, triple tap, or tap and hold to play or pause music, skip tracks, adjust volume, answer calls, or activate your voice assistant, all without reaching for your device.

Customize the long-press gesture on your earbuds to suit your needs. Choose between toggling Active Noise Cancellation (ANC), Transparency Mode, or turning them off, or set it to activate your voice assistant for quick commands.
A valid voice assistant must be installed on your device to use this feature.
At least two options are required to be selected.
In-ear detection automatically pauses playback when the earbuds are removed and resumes it when they are placed back in your ears, ensuring a seamless listening experience.
Sync Do not disturb with phone
Sync Do not disturb so that turning it on or off on one device will automatically apply the same setting to the other device. Exceptions set on the phone will also apply to the device.
Do not disturb mode on phone
This mode will be applied to the phone when Do not disturb mode is turned on on the device.

Stay organized by syncing your phone\'s calendar events directly to your watch. Receive timely reminders and alerts in advance, ensuring you\'re always prepared for meetings, appointments, and important occasions, all at a glance on your wrist.
Measurement can cause a light to flash on the back of your device.

Monitor your heart rate continuously throughout the day and receive alerts when it exceeds or falls below your set thresholds. Stay informed about your heart health and take necessary precautions to maintain a healthy lifestyle.
Monitor your stress levels and receive reminders to relax

Monitor your stress levels and receive reminders to relax and unwind when you\'re feeling overwhelmed. Stay calm and composed throughout the day with timely relaxation reminders and stress management tips.
Monitor your blood oxygen levels and receive alerts

Monitor your blood oxygen levels continuously and receive alerts when they fall below your set thresholds. Stay informed about your respiratory health and take necessary precautions to maintain a healthy lifestyle.
Track your sleep patterns and receive insights

Track your sleep patterns and receive insights into your sleep quality and duration. Enable sleep mode to ensure a restful night\'s sleep by minimizing disturbances and distractions, allowing you to wake up feeling refreshed and rejuvenated.

Track your sleep patterns and receive insights into your sleep quality and duration. Enable sleep mode to ensure a restful night\'s sleep by minimizing disturbances and distractions, allowing you to wake up feeling refreshed and rejuvenated. You can also set a sleep schedule to maintain a consistent sleep routine and improve your overall well-being.
Use the heart rate sensor to track your sleep stages and receive detailed insights into your sleep patterns.
Monitor your breathing patterns during sleep and receive a score based on your breathing quality. This feature consumes more battery power.
Enable sleep mode to minimize disturbances and distractions during sleep.

Enable sleep mode to minimize disturbances and distractions during sleep, ensuring a restful night\'s sleep. You can also set a sleep schedule to maintain a consistent sleep routine and improve your overall well-being.
Stay active and maintain a healthy lifestyle

Stay active and maintain a healthy lifestyle by receiving reminders to move when you\'ve been inactive for too long. Customize the duration and frequency of reminders to suit your needs and ensure you stay active throughout the day.

Stay active and maintain a healthy lifestyle by receiving reminders to move when you\'ve been inactive for too long. You can also enable Do Not Disturb mode during sedentary reminders to minimize distractions and focus on your activities.

Stay active and motivated by tracking your daily activities and workouts. Set fitness goals, monitor your progress, and receive insights into your activity levels to maintain a healthy lifestyle and improve your overall well-being.
Receive notifications when you reach your daily activity goals.
Allow the device to access your location to provide accurate activity tracking and workout data.
Automatically open your preferred fitness app when you start a workout on your device.
Use your device as a remote shutter to capture photos and videos from a distance. Adjust the timer and flash settings to take the perfect shot every time, without needing to touch your device.
Time format • Time zone • Date format

Secure your device by setting a password to lock the screen. Choose from a variety of unlock methods, including pattern, PIN, and password, to protect your personal information and ensure your privacy.
Hear notifications read aloud when you receive them. You can also choose to have notifications read aloud only when you\'re wearing your earbuds.
Automatically pause media playback when notifications are read aloud.
Automatically answer incoming calls when you\'re wearing your earbuds.
Automatically answer incoming calls when you\'re wearing your earbuds. Calls received when you\'re already wearing the earbuds must be answered manually.
Receive notifications when your device\'s battery is low or when it\'s fully charged.
